metadataAttributes.Title: ITIL® 4 Strategist: Direct, Plan, and Improve
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Learn the practical skills needed to create a ‘learning and improving’ IT organization with a reliable and effective strategic direction. The ITIL® 4 Strategist (Direct, Plan, and Improve) training will help you understand the impact of Agile and Lean work processes and how they can be leveraged to an organization’s advantage.
